title: Patient-Reported Outcome Measures in Individuals With Hereditary or Sporadic Kidney Cancer

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: 67% patient completion rate increased by 35% with automated reminders.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate real-time data analytics to monitor compliance trends.
